item.title: Health care is trading at a big discount to the broader market. How to play it using options
item.description: Options trader Michael Khouw talks about the low valuation in health care right now, and how to trade the sector using options.

item.title: S&P 500 guessing game: Who's next to be included, according to Stephens
item.description: Companies being added to the index can expect funds that track the stock market benchmark to buy huge amounts of their shares in coming weeks.

item.description: The upgrade comes as the fast food giant's stock has been struggling in 2025.
